content.description:
Pliny with One More Detail

Rogo ipse me, an aliquid omiserimomitto, -ere, -misi: to skip, forget rursus, et rursus paene 
omisi. Summo die Gaius Decius reliquos legatos graviter 
increpuitincrepo, -are, -ui: to scold, tamquam non omnes, quos mandavissetmando, -are, -avi: to hand over 
provincia, reos peregissentreos peregissent = “had charged as defendants”.
content.question: Made up of many provinces at its height, the Roman Empire spanned from

choices.label: the top to the bottom of the Italian peninsula
what is now France south to the island of Sicily
Spain eastward to what is now Iraq
Germany to as far east as what is now Turkey

content.answer: Spain eastward to what is now Iraq

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
